name: bitetheapple's repo
subtitle: jailbreak tools & cool apps
description: trusted and official jailbreak tools and apps.

apps.name: Flappy Bird
apps.versionDescription:
• Removed anti-cheat
• Removed Leaderboard
• Removed Accounts
apps.subtitle: The bird is back.

apps.name: Dopamine
apps.versionDescription:
• Fix an issue where the jailbreaking process would get stuck on "Patchfinding" on some device / version combinations (seemingly affected early iOS 15 arm64 devices the most) [2.4.6 regression]
• Fix issues with custom boot logos not getting set / not persisting correctly
• Fix an issue where selecting a picture taken with a camera as the custom boot logo would cause it to have the wrong orientation in some cases
apps.subtitle: iOS 15.0-16.6.1 jailbreak

apps.name: iSH
apps.localizedDescription: Alpine Linux shell emulator for iOS.
apps.subtitle: Linux on iOS

apps.name: TrollInstallerX
apps.versionDescription:
• Update for Xcode 15.4+ compilation
• Added a temporary fix for yellow iPhone 14 (Plus) devices on iOS 16.3, please use TrollInstallerX-20D50.ipa
•Removing confusing logging around exploit deinitialisation
•Fix arm64e devices on iOS 15.7.x that couldn't download the kernelcache by updating libgrabkernel2
apps.subtitle: TrollStore for iOS 14.0-16.6.1
